⚠️⚠️⚠️

Penpa+ has disabled external scripts so these tricks no longer work on the default Penpa+. [I now host my own penpa fork, dangerous-penpa-edit](https://ethannp.github.io/dangerous-penpa-edit/docs/index.html) that will not be maintained but allows external scripts. <b>Links on this page will send you to my fork, dangerous-penpa-edit</b>.
<hr />

I recommend solving [my previous Angle Loop]({% post_url 2023-11-24-puzzle39 %}) first.

Note: This puzzle is not solvable on mobile.

Sorry if the lines take a couple of attempts to draw :( The code is a little jank and I wish that it was cleaner because I think the concept is cool.

<details style="margin-bottom: 20px">
<summary>Minor hint</summary>
You have limited vision AND short arms in this puzzle.
</details>

<details style="margin-bottom: 20px">
<summary>Slightly bigger hint</summary>
The puzzle seems almost solvable like my previous Angle Loop, up to a point where some connections can't be made. How can you make those connections?
</details>

<details style="margin-bottom: 20px">
<summary>Giveaway</summary>
Open up two browser windows with the same link and connect points across the two windows.
</details>
